name: Spicy Edam Shrimp Quiche
author: Tanya
summary: Shrimp, Edam, and mushroom make this an elegant quiche. I use Red Hot Dutch Edam to give this a spicy kick, but if you can't find it, use regular Edam and spike it with red pepper flakes instead.
ingredients: ½ cup fat free sour cream
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the onion, and cook until softened and translucent, then stir in mushrooms
Pour in red wine, and simmer until the liquid has nearly evaporated
Whisk together eggs, sour cream, red pepper flakes, and salt until smooth; stir in cheese
Place shrimp into the pie shell in an even layer, sprinkle mushroom mixture over top, then pour in custard and spread evenly
Bake in preheated oven for 50 minutes until set
Allow to cool for 10 minutes before serving
